transactions.details: Pittsburgh Piratessigned free agent RHPJuan Munizto a minor league contract.
New York Yankeesplaced 2BJazz Chisholm Jr.on the 10-day injured list retroactive to April 30, 2025. Right oblique strain.
Texas Rangerssigned free agent LHPTy Blachto a minor league contract.
Washington Nationalssent RHPMichael Sorokaon a rehab assignment to Rochester Red Wings.
New York Yankeesrecalled 2BJorbit Vivasfrom Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders.
